name: appliqued
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
decorated with pieces of cloth sewn or stuck on; sewn or stuck on to something as a decoration: A plain white quilted bedcover and masses of appliquéd cushions give a romantic look. She wore a long, navy blue coat with appliquéd scarlet poppies. The quilt is made from cotton with appliqued animals and people.
More examplesFewer examplesThis is an appliquéd flag from Ghana, from the Fanti speaking people of South Central Ghana. There were some leather appliqued boots on sale at $845.Whether woven into the fabric, embroidered or appliquéd, the designs are beautifully intricate.
